name: Block Masters - Flip the Color
description:
This is a simple puzzle game of matching and eliminating horizontal and vertical lines of the same color. Move different blocks to fill up the grid and fit the puzzle.

The rules are simple. Drag the blocks horizontally or vertically and match 3 or more colors to remove lines so that the screen does not get filled up with blocks.

It is FREE to download so just start playing and challenge your friends with your new high score. And don't forget to enjoy and have fun while playing!
